Macros
mmWave Internal Defintions
mmWave API

The section has a list of all internal definitions which are used internally by the mmWave module. More...

Macros

#define MMWAVE_MAX_NUM_SPAWN_LIST   4U
 This defines the maximum number of entries in the spawn list.
 
#define MMWAVE_STATUS_OPENED   1U
 Status flag to indicate the open state.
 
#define MMWAVE_STATUS_CONFIGURED   2U
 Status flag to indicate the configured state.
 
#define MMWAVE_STATUS_SYNCHRONIZED   4U
 Status flag to indicate the synchronization state.
 
#define MMWAVE_STATUS_STARTED   8U
 Status flag to indicate the started state.
 
#define MMWAVE_RF_INITIALIZED   1U
 Link Status flag used to indicate that the RF was initialized successfully.
 
#define MMWAVE_RF_INIT_FAILED   2U
 Link Status flag used to indicate that the RF initialization failed.
 
#define MMWAVE_RF_CALIBRATION_DONE   4U
 Link Status flag used to indicate that the RF Calibration completed.
 
#define MMWAVE_RF_CALIBRATION_FAILED   8U
 Link Status flag used to indicate that the Calibration failed.
 
#define MMWAVE_RF_ESM_FAULT   16U
 Link Status flag used to indicate that the ESM fault was detected.
 
#define MMWAVE_RF_CPU_FAULT   32U
 Link Status flag used to indicate that the CPU fault was detected.
 
#define MMWAVE_RF_ANALOG_FAULT   64U
 Link Status flag used to indicate that the Analog fault was detected.
 

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all internal definitions which are used internally by the mmWave module.
